title: Roast pork with garlic and thyme sautéed potatoes and spiced apple sauce
ingredients: 1.5kg/3lb 5oz loin of pork, on the bone, chined (ask your butcher to chine the loin for you - this will make carving easier)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
500g/1lb 2oz cooking apples, peeled, cored and chopped
